Name: Tera Starstorm
Effect: Target All Foes in Range. Unique Move. *If the User is actively Terastallized, the Type of this Move changes to match that of the Tera-Type, this affects Weaknesses, Resistances and STAB accordingly. Change the type of those affected at random.
Description: Tera crystals full of energy fall from the sky as meteors. A beautiful but extemely chaotic scene follows as all Pok√©mon absorb the Tera Energy without control.
